hero.title: Capture More Leads with Advanced AI Agents

zeroCode.title: Zero-Code Implementation
zeroCode.description: Launch your AI agent in minutes—no developers needed. Our intuitive interface lets anyone build powerful automation with simple point-and-click setup.

multiChannel.title: Multi-Channel Communication
multiChannel.description: Your AI agent works 24/7 across web, WhatsApp, Messenger, and Instagram—engaging customers wherever they are, whenever they need you. More channels coming soon.

insights.title: AI-Driven Insights
insights.description: Know who's contacting you, where they're coming from, and what interests them. AI-powered metrics give you visibility into your leads to sharpen marketing outreach and segmentation.

secure.title: Secure & PCI Compliant
secure.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security. We never store your credit card information, and all personal data is highly encrypted to keep your business and customers safe.

slider.title: What Can AI Agents Do For Your Business?

analytics.title: AI-Driven Analytics
analytics.description: Unlock powerful insights into your customer behavior. Access custom AI-driven metrics that help you understand your users, track engagement patterns, and improve your audience segmentation. Our intelligent analytics dashboard surfaces actionable data, helping you identify high-value customers, optimize conversion funnels, and make data-backed decisions that drive growth.

support.title: 24/7 Customer Support
support.description: Never miss a customer inquiry again. Our AI agents work around the clock, providing instant responses to customer questions at any time of day or night. Whether it's 3 PM or 3 AM, your customers receive immediate, helpful assistance that keeps them engaged and satisfied. This continuous availability ensures you capture every opportunity and maintain customer trust, even outside business hours.

instant.title: Instant Response Times
instant.description: Say goodbye to long wait times. Our AI agents respond to customer inquiries in milliseconds, dramatically reducing response times from hours or days to seconds. This immediate engagement keeps customers interested, prevents them from bouncing to competitors, and creates a seamless experience that modern consumers expect. Fast responses lead to higher satisfaction rates and increased conversion.

qualification.title: Automated Lead Qualification
qualification.description: Let AI handle the heavy lifting of lead qualification. Our intelligent agents ask the right questions, gather essential information, and automatically score and route leads based on their potential value. This ensures your sales team focuses only on high-quality prospects, saving time and increasing close rates. The system learns from every interaction, continuously improving its qualification accuracy.

costs.title: Reduced Operational Costs
costs.description: Significantly lower your customer service expenses while improving quality. AI agents handle routine inquiries at a fraction of the cost of human agents, allowing you to scale support without proportionally scaling headcount. Reduce overhead costs including training, benefits, and infrastructure while maintaining or even improving service quality. The savings compound as your business grows.

scalable.title: Scalable Customer Engagement
scalable.description: Handle thousands of simultaneous conversations without breaking a sweat. Unlike human teams that require hiring and training to scale, AI agents can instantly accommodate traffic spikes, seasonal surges, or rapid business growth. Whether you're handling 10 or 10,000 conversations, maintain the same high-quality experience for every customer without additional costs or delays.

items.question: Can I try it before committing to a paid plan?
items.answer: Absolutely. We offer a free trial so you can experience exactly how an AI agent works for your business before making any financial commitment. Set up your agent, test it with real scenarios, and see the results for yourself. We're confident that once you see the time saved and leads captured, you'll understand the value immediately.

items.question: Will AI agents make my customer interactions feel impersonal?
items.answer: Not at all. Modern AI agents are designed to provide warm, conversational experiences that feel natural and helpful. They can remember customer preferences, use friendly language, and seamlessly hand off to human agents when a personal touch is needed. Many customers actually prefer the instant, judgment-free assistance AI provides for routine questions, while your team remains available for complex situations.

items.question: What if the AI gives wrong information to my customers?
items.answer: AI agents are trained specifically on your business information and configured with guardrails to stay within their knowledge boundaries. When they encounter questions outside their scope, they're designed to acknowledge limitations and escalate to human support rather than guess. You maintain full control over the information they share, and continuous monitoring helps identify and correct any issues quickly.

items.question: Is my business too small to benefit from AI agents?
items.answer: AI agents are particularly valuable for small businesses because they let you compete with larger companies without hiring additional staff. A solo entrepreneur can offer 24/7 support, and a small team can handle inquiry volumes that would otherwise require multiple employees. Our tiered pricing means you only pay for what you need, making AI accessible regardless of your business size.

items.question: How long does it take to set up an AI agent?
items.answer: Most businesses have their AI agent live within minutes, not weeks. Our no-code platform lets you configure your agent by simply providing your business information and preferences. No technical expertise required, no developers to hire, and no complex integrations to manage. You can start capturing leads and answering customer questions the same day you sign up.

items.question: Will I lose control over my customer relationships?
items.answer: You gain more control, not less. AI agents capture detailed information about every interaction, giving you insights into what customers are asking, what they need, and where they're coming from. You set the rules for how the AI responds, when it escalates, and what information it collects. Every conversation is logged and accessible, so you're always informed about what's happening with your customers.

items.question: What happens when the AI can't answer a question?
items.answer: Smart escalation is built into every AI agent. When a question falls outside the AI's knowledge or a customer requests human assistance, the conversation is seamlessly handed off to your team with full context. The AI can collect contact information and schedule callbacks, ensuring no inquiry falls through the cracks even outside business hours.

items.question: Are AI agents secure? What about my customers' data?
items.answer: Security is foundational to our platform. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest, we never store payment card information, and we maintain strict compliance with privacy regulations. Your customer data belongs to you and is never used to train models or shared with third parties. We undergo regular security audits to ensure your information stays protected.

items.question: Will my customers know they're talking to an AI?
items.answer: Transparency builds trust. Our AI agents can introduce themselves honestly while still providing excellent service. Research shows customers appreciate knowing they're interacting with AI when it means faster responses and 24/7 availability. The key is delivering genuine value—customers care far more about getting their questions answered quickly than whether a human or AI is helping them.

items.question: What if AI technology changes and my investment becomes obsolete?
items.answer: Our platform continuously evolves with AI advancements, and your subscription includes all updates automatically. As the technology improves, your AI agent gets smarter without any additional effort or cost on your part. You're not locked into outdated technology—you're partnering with a platform committed to keeping you at the forefront of AI capabilities.
